name: Audio Aimer
description:
This little prototype is made for research purposes. The goal of this game is to shoot the right targets and get the best score. The faster you hit the target, the more points you wil receive.

There are three different types of targets:
Normal: Shooting this target will increase your score!
Bomb: Shooting this target will lower your score by 50!
Ammo: Shooting this target will instantly add two bullets to your magazine

The spawning of the targets are based on the music you selected, the game itself already contains some songs but you can also use your own audio files (MP3 & WAV) that are on your computer. You can preview a song by hovering over the title!

Controls: 
MOUSE to look around and shoot
ESC to pause and adjust your mouse sensitivity (ESC again to resume)

Please fill in this form as it will help me in my research.

https://forms.gle/XdGP9dwYWUDLngzq9

If possible you can record your screen while playing the game and submit it through the google forms to help me analyze your behaviour in a better and clearer way.

Did you enjoy playing this game? Then you also might like these games, they are also made for this research purpose!
https://maximeylenbosch.itch.io/audio-space
